_**Agent - sidechain (claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929 2026-01-09T17:10:21.357Z)**_

<tool-use data-tool-type="read" data-tool-name="Read"><details>
<summary>Tool use: **Read**</summary>
 `/Users/ankur/.claude/statusline.sh`
```
     1→#!/bin/bash
     2→
     3→# Read JSON input
     4→input=$(cat)
     5→
     6→# DEBUG: Save the full JSON to inspect available fields
     7→echo "$input" | jq '.' > /tmp/claude-statusline-debug.json 2>/dev/null
     8→
     9→# Minimal Catppuccin Mocha colors - only 3 colors for clean look
    10→ACCENT='\033[38;2;137;180;250m'    # Blue - for key highlights (model, directory)
    11→DIM='\033[38;2;166;173;200m'       # Subtext - for most text (labels, secondary info)
    12→RESET='\033[0m'                    # Reset to default
    13→
    14→# Extract basic data
    15→dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')
    16→dname=$(basename "$dir")
    17→mid=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.id')
    18→mdis=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')
    19→
    20→# Git branch
    21→gbr=""
    22→if [ -d "$dir/.git" ] || git -C "$dir" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    23→  gbr=$(git -C "$dir" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)
    24→fi
    25→
    26→# Token data
    27→usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage')
    28→tin=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens')
    29→tout=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens')
    30→csize=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size')
    31→
    32→# Pricing (dollars per million tokens)
    33→case "$mid" in
    34→  *opus-4*) ip=15; op=75; cw=18.75; cr=1.50;;
    35→  *sonnet-4*) ip=3; op=15; cw=3.75; cr=0.30;;
    36→  *haiku-4*) ip=0.80; op=4; cw=1; cr=0.08;;
    37→  *opus-3*) ip=15; op=75; cw=18.75; cr=1.50;;
    38→  *sonnet-3-5*|*sonnet-3.5*) ip=3; op=15; cw=3.75; cr=0.30;;
    39→  *haiku-3*) ip=0.25; op=1.25; cw=0.30; cr=0.03;;
    40→  *) ip=3; op=15; cw=3.75; cr=0.30;;
    41→esac
    42→
    43→# Session stats
    44→if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then
    45→  sin=$(echo "$usage" | jq -r '.input_tokens//0')
    46→  sout=$(echo "$usage" | jq -r '.output_tokens//0')
    47→  scw=$(echo "$usage" | jq -r '.cache_creation_input_tokens//0')
    48→  scr=$(echo "$usage" | jq -r '.cache_read_input_tokens//0')
    49→
    50→  sctx=$((sin + scw + scr))
    51→  spct=$((sctx * 100 / csize))
    52→
    53→  # Cost in cents
    54→  sc=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.1f\", ($sin*$ip + $sout*$op + $scw*$cw + $scr*$cr)/10000}")
    55→
    56→  # Token format
    57→  if [ $sctx -ge 1000 ]; then
    58→    stok="$((sctx / 1000))k"
    59→  else
    60→    stok="$sctx"
    61→  fi
    62→else
    63→  spct=0
    64→  sc="0.0"
    65→  stok="0"
    66→fi
    67→
    68→# Total stats
    69→tpct=$((tin * 100 / csize))
    70→[ $tpct -gt 100 ] && tpct=100
    71→
    72→tc=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.1f\", ($tin*$ip + $tout*$op)/10000}")
    73→
    74→if [ $tin -ge 1000 ]; then
    75→  ttok="$((tin / 1000))k"
    76→else
    77→  ttok="$tin"
    78→fi
    79→
    80→# Session time
    81→tpath=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.transcript_path')
    82→if [ -f "$tpath" ]; then
    83→  sstart=$(stat -f %B "$tpath" 2>/dev/null || stat -c %W "$tpath" 2>/dev/null || echo 0)
    84→  if [ $sstart -gt 0 ]; then
    85→    now=$(date +%s)
    86→    sdur=$((now - sstart))
    87→    if [ $sdur -lt 60 ]; then
    88→      stime="${sdur}s"
    89→    elif [ $sdur -lt 3600 ]; then
    90→      stime="$((sdur / 60))m"
    91→    else
    92→      stime="$((sdur / 3600))h$((sdur % 3600 / 60))m"
    93→    fi
    94→  else
    95→    stime="0m"
    96→  fi
    97→else
    98→  stime="0m"
    99→fi
   100→
   101→# Sleek Tetris-like progress bars with horizontal rectangles
   102→make_bar() {
   103→  local pct=$1
   104→  local filled=$((pct * 12 / 100))
   105→  local empty=$((12 - filled))
   106→  local bar=""
   107→
   108→  for ((i=0; i<filled; i++)); do
   109→    bar="${bar}▰"
   110→  done
   111→  for ((i=0; i<empty; i++)); do
   112→    bar="${bar}▱"
   113→  done
   114→
   115→  echo "$bar"
   116→}
   117→
   118→sbar=$(make_bar $spct)
   119→tbar=$(make_bar $tpct)
   120→
   121→# Shorten model name
   122→mshort="$mdis"
   123→case "$mdis" in
   124→  *"Opus 4.5"*) mshort="Opus 4.5";;
   125→  *"Opus 4"*) mshort="Opus 4";;
   126→  *"Sonnet 4.5"*) mshort="Sonnet 4.5";;
   127→  *"Sonnet 4"*) mshort="Sonnet 4";;
   128→  *"Sonnet 3.5"*|*"3.5 Sonnet"*) mshort="Sonnet 3.5";;
   129→  *"Haiku 4"*) mshort="Haiku 4";;
   130→  *"Haiku 3.5"*) mshort="Haiku 3.5";;
   131→esac
   132→
   133→# Build clean, minimal output
   134→out=""
   135→
   136→# Directory + git (accent color only for directory name)
   137→if [ -n "$gbr" ]; then
   138→  out="${ACCENT}${dname}${RESET} ${DIM}(${gbr})${RESET} "
   139→else
   140→  out="${ACCENT}${dname}${RESET} "
   141→fi
   142→
   143→# Model (accent color)
   144→out="${out}${ACCENT}${mshort}${RESET} ${DIM}•${RESET} "
   145→
   146→# Current session (formerly S:)
   147→out="${out}${DIM}Current: \$${sc} ${stok} ${sbar} ${spct}% (${stime})${RESET} ${DIM}•${RESET} "
   148→
   149→# Weekly total (formerly L:)
   150→out="${out}${DIM}Weekly: \$${tc} ${tbar} ${tpct}%${RESET}"
   151→
   152→printf "%b" "$out"
   153→
```
</details></tool-use>
